### **Template Code**
Use these R Script and Rmd Markdown template scripts for your own _Coding for Broader Impact_ projects. They can be downloaded (cloned) with the repository or downloaded individually at the links here:  

  * [Iteration R Script - Template](https://github.com/dbturner/c4bi/blob/main/report_code/template/template_rScript.R)  
  * [Report RMarkdown - Template](https://github.com/dbturner/c4bi/blob/main/report_code/template/template_rmd.Rmd)  
  * [Sample Reports - Template](https://dbturner.github.io/c4bi/articles/template_examples_vignette.html)
